text: وَلَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡقِصَاصِ حَيَوٰةٞ يَـٰٓأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَتَّقُونَ

translation.en: And there is for you in legal retribution [saving of] life, O you [people] of understanding, that you may become righteous
translation.id: Dan dalam kisas itu ada (jaminan) kehidupan bagimu, wahai orang-orang yang berakal, agar kamu bertakwa
